italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start obs POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-t CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:ast POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-t CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:dagger POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-t CLOSE:) PERIOD:.

N^{\dagger}(t)=\left[{\int^{1.4}_{{m_{\tau}(t)}}\phi(m)\,dm\over\int^{1.4}_{0.% 8}\phi(m)\,dm}\right]N^{\ast}(t)={\alpha(t)\over\beta}N^{\ast}(t);
